name: SEARCH ALL - UFO
description:
SEARCH ALL - UFO

is a free hidden object game in which you have to find all the flying saucers in a large area. The flying saucers will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks animated due to the animation elements. Find all the flying saucers! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key features:
- Animation elements on the location;
- 100 flying saucers to find;
- Nice soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
